original_text: So David and the elders of Israel and the commanders of units of a thousand went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord from the house of Obed-Edom, with rejoicing.
korean_text: 이에 다윗과 이스라엘 장로들과 천부장들이 가서 여호와의 언약궤를 즐거이 메고 오벧에돔의 집에서 올라왔는데

sentences.original_text: So David and the elders of Israel
and the commanders of units of a thousand
went to bring up the ark of the covenant
of the Lord from the house of Obed-Edom
